main event: Witnesses reported a mysterious flying object in Wilmington, North Carolina on May 31, 1948, that emitted smoke and had an oblong shape.
interesting points: The object was described as about three feet long and emitted smoke., Witnesses reported the object was traveling at a high altitude and making a sound like a scream., The Civil Aeronautics Administration discredited a suggestion that it could have been an F-80 plane., The report mentions that this incident is one of many similar sightings in the area since early April., Evidence was found to be contradictory, suggesting possible explanations including a meteor.
witness description: Mrs. H. D. Alsobrook and her sister, who also saw the object, along with another neighbor, Mrs. S. P. Huffman.
